title: Katagami Textile Stencil with Geometric Floral Design
dimensions:
paper: H. 26.2 x W. 41.2 cm (10 5/16 x 16 1/4 in.)
pattern unit dimensions: H. 20 x W. 34.5 cm (7 7/8 x 13 9/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Museum Collection
medium: Chûban (medium-sized) minogami (mulberry bark paper) treated with persimmon juice and cut using the "kiribori" (drill-carving), "dôgubori" (punch-carving), and "tsukibori" (thrust-carving) techniques

images.copyright: President and Fellows of Harvard College
